author: duncf
msg: Adding support for building debian packages from CVS.
Run from top level directory, debian/build.pl and then run
dpkg-buildpackage as usual (remember you need the -b option, source
uploads are impossible) or use debian/build.pl -d

author: quinlan
msg: - add rules designed to loosely identify viruses so they can be removed
from mass-check results or flagged by users for further analysis
- add MIME_LONG_LINE_QP rule for spam detection
